album.title: Herbarium.INFO Herbs: Dicotyledones & Monocotyledones

name: Лимонниковые - Schisandraceae
comment:
Schisandraceae is a family of flowering plants with 3 known genera and a total of 92 known species (Luo et al., 2018 list all known species with their geographic occurrence). Such a family has been recognized by most taxonomists, at least for the past several decades. Before that, the plants concerned were assigned to family Magnoliaceae and Illiciaceae.
The APG IV and APG III systems of taxonomy recognize this family and place it on the order Austrobaileyales.
